statements: SELECT * FROM drug_expiration_dates;
SELECT drug_id, drug_name FROM drug_expiration_dates;
SELECT drug_id, expiration_date FROM drug_expiration_dates WHERE storage_condition = 'Dry';
SELECT * FROM drug_expiration_dates ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM drug_expiration_dates WHERE drug_id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM drug_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM drug_expiration_dates WHERE storage_condition = 'Cool and Dry' AND expiration_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, expiration_date, storage_condition FROM drug_expiration_dates WHERE drug_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY drug_id
SELECT drug_name, DATE_FORMAT(expiration_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_expiry FROM drug_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE()
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date, DATEDIFF(expiration_date, CURDATE()) AS days_until_expiry FROM drug_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-01' ORDER BY days_until_expiry ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM Drug;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drug;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drug WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ExpirationLog ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, drug_id, log_description FROM ExpirationLog WHERE drug_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Drug WHERE drug_name LIKE 'Aspirin';
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drug ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drug WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, log_description FROM Drug JOIN ExpirationLog ON Drug.drug_id = ExpirationLog.drug_id;
SELECT DISTINCT drug_name FROM Drug WHERE expiration_date > '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM drugs;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT drug_name, purchase_date FROM drugs JOIN purchases ON drugs.drug_id = purchases.drug_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT supplier_name, purchase_date FROM suppliers JOIN purchases ON suppliers.supplier_id = purchases.supplier_id WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM drugs ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%City%';

SELECT purchases.purchase_id, drugs.drug_name, suppliers.supplier_name, purchases.purchase_date FROM purchases INNER JOIN drugs ON purchases.drug_id = drugs.drug_id INNER JOIN suppliers ON purchases.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM suppliers INNER JOIN purchases ON suppliers.supplier_id = purchases.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_purchases > 1;
SELECT * FROM drugs ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM drugs WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM quality_checks WHERE result = TRUE ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drugs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE id = 3;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM drugs ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_checks WHERE result = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drugs WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM Manufacturers ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT drug_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Orders GROUP BY drug_name;
SELECT test_id, test_date, test_result FROM QualityTests WHERE test_result='Pass' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drugs;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drugs WHERE expiration_date > '2022-08-31';
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, expiration_date FROM Drugs WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer_name FROM Drugs JOIN Manufacturers ON Drugs.drug_id = drug_id;
SELECT Orders.order_id, Drugs.drug_name, Orders.quantity FROM Orders JOIN Drugs ON Orders.drug_id = Drugs.drug_id WHERE quantity > 100;
